Unbreakable Will.name: Unbreakable Will
descriptions: Increases your chance to resist Stun, Fear, and Silence effects by an additional 4%.
Increases your chance to resist Stun, Fear, and Silence effects by an additional 8%.
Increases your chance to resist Stun, Fear, and Silence effects by an additional 12%.
Increases your chance to resist Stun, Fear, and Silence effects by an additional 16%.
Increases your chance to resist Stun, Fear, and Silence effects by an additional 20%.

Divination.name: Divination
descriptions: Increases your damage with Wands by 10%, grants 10% spellpower bonus to your wand attacks, and grants your Wand attacks a 20% chance to refresh the duration of your Holy Fire debuff on the target.
Increases your damage with Wands by 20%, grants 20% spellpower bonus to your wand attacks, and grants your Wand attacks a 40% chance to refresh the duration of your Holy Fire debuff on the target.
Increases your damage with Wands by 30%, grants 30% spellpower bonus to your wand attacks, and grants your Wand attacks a 60% chance to refresh the duration of your Holy Fire debuff on the target.
Increases your damage with Wands by 40%, grants 40% spellpower bonus to your wand attacks, and grants your Wand attacks a 80% chance to refresh the duration of your Holy Fire debuff on the target.
Increases your damage with Wands by 50%, grants 50% spellpower bonus to your wand attacks, and grants your Wand attacks a 100% chance to refresh the duration of your Holy Fire debuff on the target.

Faithfulness.name: Faithfulness
descriptions: Reduces the cooldown of your Power Word: Shield by 1 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of your Power Word: Shield by 2 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of your Power Word: Shield by 3 sec.

Words of Power.name: Words of Power
descriptions: Increases the effect and reduces the mana cost of your Power Word: Fortitude and Prayer of Fortitude spells by 25%.
Increases the effect and reduces the mana cost of your Power Word: Fortitude and Prayer of Fortitude spells by 50%.

Silent Resolve.name: Silent Resolve
descriptions: Reduces the threat generated by your spells by 10%, and reduces the chance your spells are dispelled by 10%.
Reduces the threat generated by your spells by 20%, and reduces the chance your spells are dispelled by 20%.
Reduces the threat generated by your spells by 30%, and reduces the chance your spells are dispelled by 30%.

Fire Within.name: Fire Within
descriptions: Increases the Armor bonus of your Inner Fire spell by 20%, and increases the number of charges by 20.
Increases the Armor bonus of your Inner Fire spell by 40%, and increases the number of charges by 40.
Increases the Armor bonus of your Inner Fire spell by 60%, and increases the number of charges by 60.
Increases the Armor bonus of your Inner Fire spell by 80%, and increases the number of charges by 80.
Increases the Armor bonus of your Inner Fire spell by 100%, and increases the number of charges by 100.

Inner Focus.name: Inner Focus
descriptions: When activated, reduces the Mana cost of your next spell by 100% and increases its critical effect chance by 25% if it is capable of a critical effect.

Meditation.name: Meditation
descriptions: Allows 10% of your Mana regeneration to continue while casting.
Allows 20% of your Mana regeneration to continue while casting.
Allows 30% of your Mana regeneration to continue while casting.
Allows 40% of your Mana regeneration to continue while casting.
Allows 50% of your Mana regeneration to continue while casting.

Martyrdom.name: Martyrdom
descriptions: Your Power Word: Shield grants the target 15% movement speed for 5 seconds.
Your Power Word: Shield grants the target 30% movement speed for 5 seconds.

Mental Agility.name: Mental Agility
descriptions: Reduces the mana cost of your instant cast spells by 3%, and grants 10% of your healing power as spell damage.
Reduces the mana cost of your instant cast spells by 6%, and grants 20% of your healing power as spell damage.
Reduces the mana cost of your instant cast spells by 9%, and grants 30% of your healing power as spell damage.
Reduces the mana cost of your instant cast spells by 12%, and grants 40% of your healing power as spell damage.
Reduces the mana cost of your instant cast spells by 15%, and grants 50% of your healing power as spell damage.

Spiritual Domination.name: Spiritual Domination
descriptions: Reduces the casting time of your Mana Burn spell by 1 second, and increases the effect of your Mana Burn, Divine Spirit, and Prayer of Spirit by 30%.

Power Infusion.name: Power Infusion
descriptions: Infuses the target with power, increasing their spell damage and healing by 20%.  Lasts 15 seconds.

Mental Strength.name: Mental Strength
descriptions: Increases your maximum Mana by 5%.
Increases your maximum Mana by 10%.
Increases your maximum Mana by 15%.
Increases your maximum Mana by 20%.

Force of Will.name: Force of Will
descriptions: Increases your spell damage by 1% and the critical strike chance of your offensive spells by 1%.
Increases your spell damage by 2% and the critical strike chance of your offensive spells by 2%.
Increases your spell damage by 3% and the critical strike chance of your offensive spells by 3%.
Increases your spell damage by 4% and the critical strike chance of your offensive spells by 4%.
Increases your spell damage by 5% and the critical strike chance of your offensive spells by 5%.

Penance.name: Penance
descriptions: Launches a volley of holy light at the target, causing 115 damage to an enemy, or 115 healing to an ally instantly and every second for 2 seconds.

Divine Aegis.name: Divine Aegis
descriptions: Your critical heals with Flash Heal and Penance grant the target a Divine Aegis, absorbing 10% of the amount healed. Stacks up to 3 times.
Your critical heals with Flash Heal and Penance grant the target a Divine Aegis, absorbing 20% of the amount healed. Stacks up to 3 times.
Your critical heals with Flash Heal and Penance grant the target a Divine Aegis, absorbing 30% of the amount healed. Stacks up to 3 times.
